org.flowvisor.flows

Interface FlowDB

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<FlowDBEntry>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinearFlowDB, NoopFlowDB

    public interface FlowDB
extends java.lang.Iterable<FlowDBEntry>
    An FV-local copy of the flow table state on the switch track flow_mods and flow_expire messages
    Author:
    capveg
